issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The MQTTNioTest and MQTTSSLTest test suites hang when run under Jenkins on HP-UX.  The tests all have timeouts, but the hang occurs in FailOnTimeout, as shown in the stack trace below.

jenkins@srt-hpux:/fuse/jenkins/>jstack 25654
2014-07-10 04:24:00
Full thread dump Java HotSpot(TM) Server VM (24.51-b03-jre1.7.0.09-rc1 mixed mode):

fields.summary: Some MQTT tests hang on HP-UX

comments.body: There's been many fixes to the MQTT transports and the NIO / SSL bits that underpin the transport layer, recommend watching to see if newer instance experience anything similar.
